H0.text: In 2001 which movie was the first winner of the Best Animated Movie Oscar. Monsters, Inc.

H1.text: In 2001 which movie was the first winner of the Best Animated Movie Oscar. Spirited Away

H2.text: In 2001 which movie was the first winner of the Best Animated Movie Oscar. Lilo & Stitch

H3.text: In 2001 which movie was the first winner of the Best Animated Movie Oscar. שרעק

A4.text: Shrek won the inaugural Academy Award for Best Animated Feature.
